morphInfos.tenseExplained: it is happening in the present
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does oneself or is done to one
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.genderExplained: they are male or take a masculine form
morphInfos.description: something of a man that _is done _ good _(by himself?)_
morphInfos.explanation: an action that is done to (or for?) a male person or thing that something belongs to
